name: Easter Stone (GMTK Jam20)
description:
You control a statue, it must return on its start-point, when you jump, a tremor will move all the tiles around the statue (except for the portals and the start-point) to do this use the arrows or the pad, if you analyze, you can understand how the tremor work, but its really out of control. If you want to restart a puzzle, press escape or select.

The Tree is collision.
The Canon and The Hole is death.
The Sheep is a jump over this one.
The Key make accessible the ending.
The Portal teleports you to the other one.

You can create your own levels with the level editor, for that, use left click to place the tiles and right click to erase a tile. Use the scroll wheel to switch between the tiles, press space to play.
If you want to share your levels with friends, you have to go to the Local App Data folder of the game : C:\Users\UsersName\AppData\Local\GMKT_JAM_Stone

Good luck.

Game by Andolink
Music by SeiferSJ
